Method Detail

evaluateXPathExpression

public static void evaluateXPathExpression(java.lang.String XMLData,
                                           java.lang.String XPathExpression,
                                           EvaluationResult result)
                                    throws javax.xml.xpath.XPathExpressionException
evaluateXPathExpression evaluates an XPath expression on an XML string.

Parameters:
XMLData - a string containing the XML data
XPathExpression - a string including the XPath expression
result - an object of type EvaluationResult for keeping the result of the evaluation process
Throws:
javax.xml.xpath.XPathExpressionException - if the XPath expression is not a valid expression and an exception has occurred that interferes with the XPath expression's operation

getCharacterDataFromElement

public static java.lang.String getCharacterDataFromElement(org.w3c.dom.Element element)
getCharacterDataFromElement returns the data value of an element in an XML data

Parameters:
element - an object containing an element of the XML data
Returns:
returns a string which includes the text of the element

getFeatureModelViews

public static java.util.List<java.util.Map> getFeatureModelViews(java.lang.String viewDir)
                                                          throws HandlerExecutionException
getFeatureModelViews returns a list of views of a special feature.

Parameters:
viewDir - a string containing the real path to the views folder
Returns:
a list of views
Throws:
HandlerExecutionException - if an exception has occurred that interferes with the handler's normal operation

getXPathFromView

public static java.lang.String getXPathFromView(java.lang.String viewDir,
                                                java.lang.String featureModelName,
                                                java.lang.String viewName)
getXPathFromView gets the XPath expression that is stored in a view file.

Parameters:
viewDir - a string containing the real path to the view's folder
featureModelName - a string containing the name of a feature model
viewName - a string containing the name of a view
Returns:
a string including the XPath expression

checkFeatureInViewStatus

public static void checkFeatureInViewStatus(splar.core.fm.FeatureTreeNode feature,
                                            java.lang.String viewDir,
                                            java.lang.String modelDir,
                                            java.lang.String featureModelFileName,
                                            java.lang.String featureModelName,
                                            java.lang.String viewName,
                                            FeatureInViewCheckingResult result,
                                            java.lang.String visualizationType)
checkFeatureInViewStatus checks the visibility of a feature in a special view.

Parameters:
feature - a FeatureTreeNode object including the feature should be checked
viewDir - a string containing the real path to the views folder
modelDir - a string containing the real path to the models folder
featureModelFileName - a string including the file name in which the model is stored
featureModelName - the name of the model that the feature is part of it
viewName - the name of the view
result - a FeatureInViewCheckingResult object keeping the visibility status of the feature in the view
visualizationType - a string including one of four valid values for visualization: none (not a visualization), greyed,pruned and collapsed
